entry.title: Spectrums of Color and a Face in Common
entry.summary:
Author: RenkonNairu

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,930Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 514

Summary: Earthlings don't see color until they make eye-contact with their soulmates for the first time.But Kryptonians say your soulmate will resemble you. You look like you belong in the same House.Batman encounters reporter Clark Kent, their eyes meet through the cowl and Bruce can see color for the first time.Clark can't help but noticed that, to spite being from different planets, Bruce Wayne looks a lot like him. Bruce Wayne must be his soulmate! Superman keeps showing up in Gotham to try and speak to Bruce.But Bruce knows his soulmate is that rando nobody of a reporter from the Daily Planet and has no time for the alien's romantic overtures.

entry.title: Two's Company, Three is a Crowd, Four is a Party
entry.summary:
Author: Heylittleguy21

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,998Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Every machine is made up of smaller, more intricate parts that help the machine function. A cog turns another cog that cog turns another cog which turns another cog. These cogs eventually turn the hands on a clock tower. Even the smallest one is fundamental to the efficiency of the clock tower. For the Justice League, you are that cog. You keep them turning. You keep the public's infallible heroes functioning, you keep them from falling apart. The public may never know your face or your name and they definitely won't know that you're the glue that keeps the Justice League together. The public will never know how essential you are to the Justice League and even more to the "Trinity". Or how you will be. This fic describes how exactly you become a vital part of the Justice League and maybe fall in love along the way.

entry.title: Champagne Problems
entry.summary:
Author: spideytorches

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,094Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 30

Summary: A hand approaches Clark's chest, where his messily done tie is taken out of his loose suit and into the billionaire's fingers. Wayne pets it like it's some kind of cat, then gives a decent tug that Clark has to consciously remember that he is not, in fact, an unmovable object at the moment.He finds his face inches away from the host of the Gala currently ravaging the place downstairs, who stares deeply into Clark's eyes like he’s trying to find something important.“I– I um– I-It's Kent, Clark Kent, actually– I was just– uh… Bathroom?” Clark attempts, stupidly, earning a sparkle from Wayne's faded eyes.“Silly,” Wayne murmurs, an airy chuckle coming with his fingers tracing up Clark's tie, and he almost expects the man to take him by the shoulders and push him out of the room. Instead, delicate fingers wrap themselves around the garment, starting to untie it completely. “Does this look like a bathroom to you?”

entry.title: Sweet Dreams
entry.summary:
Author: NoodleDragon324

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,383Chapters: 7/8Kudos: 46

Summary: Batman finds himself caught by an old foe who comes back for revenge. Trapped in a world where everything he dreams was true seems to be real, things he long tucked away begin to resurface. He knows deep down that this world isn’t real, but it’s hard to let go of something so, so good.Superman grows distraught when his best friend goes missing. He must find him and stop whatever new evil has taken Batman while he and the rest of the League weren’t watching. But will Batman be the same after this? Will he bounce back this time, as he had all those times before? Regardless, Superman will be there to make sure his friend is okay.ORA solo-mission-gone-wrong leaves Bruce trapped in a world that seems too good to be true until Superman breaks him free. Now he must pick up the pieces of himself he once tried so hard to tuck away.

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,682Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 168

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.

entry.title: Then He Kiss'd Me
entry.summary:
Author: Alwhisker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,159Chapters: 7/20Kudos: 109

Summary: .... - "I didn’t need a glorified spandex ad to come to my aid" Wayne's tone was glowering and slightly breathless as he wiped the blood off his chin, looking over to the caped man who’d been covered in dust and rain, clark was taken aback, but remained his composure, it wasn't time to bicker with billionaires just yet. "you're welcome" he muttered, floating up to look over the crowd, he watched as the officers surrounded Bruce Wayne, EMT's checking over his wounds as the criminals were carted away into padded cars, flashing lights of cameras clicking around the scene. but clark could only focus on the man wiping his bleeding lip, effortlessly drawing him in, among the thousands of voices in his mind, only one stood out.only one."Alfred, I promise you I am fine, I- no, my leg’s fine, Grayson. Damian, stop."Clark found himself grinning, soft enough that he didn't notice it at first, but the clicks of cameras and flashing lights woke him up from his daydream, the wind under his chin was getting colder, Gotham's air was gentle on his skin, despite the smog in the air and the scent of blood that somehow always lingered, no matter how much they scrubbed down the streets.
